The problem some people seem to be having is that they think its bad/trashy/stupid that the boyfriend gets cucked. yeah thats literally the point of the NTR genre. You can empathize with someone whos had their gf/wife/crush '''''taken''''' from them but thats one of the designed feelings for NTR. The problem is that your expectations aren't inline with what NTR is. If you hate NTR that much then you should just blacklist it. I also think if you haven't had sex/relationships you shouldn't be criticizing realism in doujins lmao. Someone having sex for the first few times is obviously going to be nervous but after you know what you're doing its incredibly easy not to be nervous, especially if you've had sex with the same person multiple times. The thing that makes me cringe the most abt this website is it feels like ppl have such rigid ideas of how people act with no experience and all of their ideas comes from tv/manga/hentai its suuuuper depressing lol. (mucho texto thx bye)
guys. I myself also do not like NTR but I just avoid it. I always look at the tags for NTR and activly try to stop myself. Just look at the tags and you dont have to complain.
